# 𓏞 𓏟 scribe scrape script ⲍⲣⲁⲫⲏ ⲕⲣⲁⲫⲏ graph

𒊬 ŠAR šakar šahar •SCAR scribe! सब्ज़ sabz IE *sker- ‘cut’

𒈬 𒊬𒊏 mu-sar-ra im-scarra inscription musara #musarû 𒈬𒊬𒌑 mu.sar-ú im-scrúve inscribed 𒅆𒋛𒀀 šcriṭir

ز ب ر z-b-r زَبَّرَ zabbara “to write” < scribe, case, cut stone

𓊃 𓈙 𓏞 𓏝 | write, inscribe | ⲥϧⲁⲓ sxai{b/t} scribe scrit schreib ⇔ script
𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓏏 𓍼 𓏤 | roll (of papyrus) | scrit
𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓇇||papyrus plant|χειρit™ > scrit Schrift script ⇔ write 𓏟
𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓇇||papyrus plant|cherīd™ > reed 𓇅

𒁾𒊬𒊒 tup-šar-ru טפסר tafsar 𐎒𐎔𐎗 spr +++
𒁾𒊬𒊒 scribe ⇔ סופֿר soyfer

𓋴 𓆼 𓀁 זְכַרְיָה zəḵaryā זכר "remebered" 𓋴 𓇋 𓎛 𓃶 saḫa sacret "good"

𒄭𒀀𒌅 ḫi-a-ṭu √critique ⇔ right 𒄭
𒄭𒀀𒌅 check, to supervise, weigh (out)

Signs which were connected to scribal notches see dents

𒈬𒊬𒌑 𒅆𒋛𒀀 𒈬𒅀
MU.SAR-ú ši-ṭir MU-ia
im-scrúve šcriṭir namu'ia an inscribed object bearing my name 𓇑

𒈬𒊬𒂊 𒅆𒋛𒀀 𒈬𒋙
MU.SAR-e ši-ṭir MU-šú em-scarve scritir nomu-šú. an inscribed object bearing his name

𒈬𒃻𒊑𒂊 𒀭𒉌𒂊 𒆳𒊒 mu-šá-re-e an-né-e šaṭ-ru em.screive année šaṭru recorded on this inscribed object

𒂟 ZÁLAG ≈ zirati "forces" zabi •zʳabi™ •serbi serfs conscripts ERIN.mes armies ≈ 𒁕 ≈ 𒀸𒐺𒈫
